title: MFA & Authenticator App Issues
description: Troubleshooting Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) and Authenticator app problems.

steps.title: Check Time Settings
steps.instruction: Ensure the time execution settings on your phone are set to 'Automatic'. Mismatched time causes codes to fail.

steps.title: Check Internet Connection
steps.instruction: Ensure your phone has a stable internet connection (Wi-Fi or Mobile Data) to receive push notifications.

steps.title: Use One-Time Code
steps.instruction: If push notification fails, open the authenticator app manually and enter the 6-digit One-Time Password (OTP) displayed.

steps.title: Update App
steps.instruction: Check the App Store or Play Store to ensure your Authenticator app is updated to the latest version.

steps.title: Ticket Preparation
steps.instruction: If you lost your phone or cannot access the app, raise a ticket to request an 'MFA Reset' with your Employee ID and Mobile Number.
